Chapter 2 Proposal 2.1 Research topic 2.2 Data availability

Chapter 2 Proposal 2.1 Research topic 2.2 Data availability We will use datasets from the Center for Disease Control (CDC) and the National Fire Incident Reporting System (NFIRS) in our analyses. The CDC United States Drought Monitor reports weekly drought estimates at the county level for the contiguous United States. NFIRS Public Data contains fire incident information across the US.
